paragraphs.title: When
paragraphs.p: Matrix A is nilpotent, with A^{n-1} \ne \zerovec.

paragraphs.title: How
paragraphs.p:
Choose an index j such that the \nth[j] column of A^{n-1} is nonzero. Then take the columns of P to be
\uvec{p}_1 \amp = \uvec{e}_j, \amp \uvec{p}_2 \amp = A\uvec{e}_j, \amp \uvec{p}_3 \amp = A^2\uvec{e}_j, \amp \amp\dotsc, \amp \uvec{p}_n \amp = A^{n-1}\uvec{e}_j , where \uvec{e}_j is the \nth[j] standard basis vector.

paragraphs.title: Result
paragraphs.p: Always exactly of the form described at the beginning of this section.
